name: Zombie Mart
description:
This is Zombie Mart! A game where you play as an upstanding Zombie dad, going on a not-so-unfamiliar quest to shop for groceries for your Zombie family! Complete puzzles and quests as you discover what you need for your fantastical Zombie feast! (Brains included!)

How To Play:

Use WASD to move around the world. Use Z to interact with people and objects. Use Enter to open and close the Quest Checklist

Team:

Kylie Warrick - Story, Concept Art, Character Sprites, Text Box and Profile Design, Logo Design

Jared Bosley - Story, Programming

Alex Broderick - Story, Music, Game Sprites, Title Screen Design

Elisa Kucalaba - Story, Concept Art, Background Layout Design, Background Tileset
